document.full_text: forces loyal to ivory coast incumbent leader laurent gbagbo stepped up a counter-attack on presidential claimant alassane ouattara on saturday by firing on his hotel headquarters in abidjan.
document.title: gbagbo's forces attack ouattara's ivory coast base
lines_and_colors: forces loyal to ivory coast incumbent leader laurent gbagbo stepped up a counter-attack on presidential claimant alassane ouattara on saturday by firing on his hotel headquarters in abidjan.
